name: Bite the Hand
book: Pathfinder Campaign Setting: Pathfinder Society Field Guide. © 2011, Paizo Publishing, LLC
target: one creature summoned by a spell or spell-like ability
text: With a short command and a wave of the hand, you compel the target creature to attack the being who summoned it, to the best of its ability. If the being who summoned it is not present, the creature acts normally according to its last task or instructions. This spell has no effect on called creatures, summoned creatures not brought forth by spells or spell-like abilities (such as a summoner's eidolon), or bonded creatures not explicitly summoned, such as a paladin's mount or wizard's familiar.
target_zh: 借由法术或类法术能力召唤出的一名生物
text_zh: 借由简短的指令以及只手轻挥，你迫使目标生物用尽全力攻击召唤它出来的存在。 如果该存在并不在场，该生物会依据最后的任务或指示如常行动。本法术对于呼唤(called)而来的生物、并非由法术或类法术能力(像是召唤师的幻灵)召唤而来的生物，或并非被明确召唤的契约生物(像是圣武士的坐骑或法师的魔宠)无效。
